name: TheAppBuilder
tagline: The world's leading mobile enterprise app platform
description:
Over the last 6 years TheAppBuilder team has developed and brought to market an innovative cloud platform that enables enterprise grade, native mobile apps to be very quickly created, published and updated by non-technical people. Â 
We've already built up an impressive global client list that includes organisations such as British Airways, Carlsberg, Pfizer, Michelin, Visa and Virgin, to name a few across the UK, Europe and USA.
Unlike custom software houses, we use our unique SaaS tooling to reduce the risks, timescales and cost of mobile enterprise apps. All our apps include an easy to use, integral content management system enabling speedy app updating by anyone.
